name: Pillagers Plague
description:
A tower defense game where the attackers come back as zombies after 10 seconds!

  • As an attacker they have slightly weaker health than when they are zombies.
  • Different defense towers cost different amount of gold
    • Each time you take out an attacker or zombie, you are rewarded with gold!

This game was made for the Ludum Dare 51 game jam with the theme "Every 10 seconds" - we'd love if you could leave a comment and a rating on our jam page!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/51/pillagers-plague
